channel.title: Every item goes under weapon spot
channel.description: ok i added new items and i need help with a couple of things. 1- i added to shops says non existing 1 coin(how do i fix that) 2- make all items go where there supposed to go. (i got to item.java and put lets say dragon fire shield under shiled it still goes under wep spot. 3- lastly kind of like number 1 how do i change the prices of things in shops
